job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of using human knowledge to enhance an AI system, which aligns with the definition of improving or fine-tuning AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions and providing feedback on AI-generated solutions, which is a core aspect of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and testing of new tools and methods, which falls under software development and integration, even if the tools are AI-related.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system to resolve customer issues, fitting the definition of integrating AI into applications.

soft_skills.phrase: we will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the need for rapid learning and adaptation to new products within a short timeframe.

soft_skills.phrase: if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the importance of self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills to overcome challenges independently.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support resolutions and improving AI systems by providing feedback and participating in fine-tuning. While there's an element of AI model improvement (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on applying and integrating these AI capabilities into a customer-facing support system (1.A.1). The role is not primarily about developing AI models from scratch or specializing deeply in GenAI techniques but rather using AI to augment existing support functions. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile as it involves building or maintaining software that uses AI features as a core part of its functionality, with the output being an AI-augmented support system.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a customer support context. The tasks are specific enough to map to the coding book categories. However, the ad is relatively brief and doesn't go into deep technical detail about the AI models or specific software development practices, which prevents a perfect score.
